name: submissively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that allows yourself to be controlled by other people: She knelt submissively at his feet. He submissively did as he was told. See
submissive
More examplesFewer examplesThe boy fell to the ground, submissively holding his hands out in front of him."Guess you're right, Randy," he said submissively.Did the people submissively accept dictatorship without a struggle?
